pullrequest.title: Add Visual::SetMaterialShaderParam function for setting shader parameters.

content.raw:
This increases the required version of OGRE from 1.8.1 to 1.9.0 because of usage of [`void setNamedConstant(const String& name, const Vector2& vec);`](https://bitbucket.org/sinbad/ogre/src/dd30349ea6670e3cd962d9d41a8039de3a3482d3/OgreMain/include/OgreGpuProgramParams.h?at=v1-9-0&fileviewer=file-view-default#OgreGpuProgramParams.h-570), which is only available in 1.9.0.

It seems that 1.9.0 is also available through standard Trusty PPAs, but anyways it looks like it might make somebody unhappy... Did you consider this?
